description: A vulnerability in SonicOS SNMP service resulting exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized user.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: SonicOS Gen 7 NSv-Series 7.0.1.0-5030-1391 and earlier versions.
SonicOS Gen 7 NSa-Series 7.0.1-5030-R2007 and earlier versions.
SonicOS Gen 7 TZ-Series 7.0.1-5030-R2007 and earlier versions.
SonicOS Gen 7 NSsp-Series 7.0.1-5030-R780 and earlier versions.
